Do you want to look exactly like the Dragonborn shown in the Trailers and Wallpapers?
Well, with this mod you can.
descriptionHtml:
First:
If you\'ve got more experience in animating than me, who is actually a beginner, please feel free to do a better version of this mod.



Do you want to look exactly like the Dragonborn shown in the Trailers and Wallpapers?
Well, with this mod you can (kind of).
It changes the default one-handed idle animation to the well-known heroic pose.

Here is a video:
www.youtube.com/watch?v=9QdnkiILw6c

Installation:
- Download the archive
- Unzip
- Copy the contet of the data Folder into your Data folder
- Done.

Known fails:
- Left hand looks terrible, don\'t know how to fix it.
- Transition from vanilla animations to idle animation is too fast, looks weird. But fixing this needs more skill in 3D animating than I currently have. Feel free to do it by yourself, if you are able to!

P.S.:
This is my first work with 3D Animation Software and also my first real Skyrim mod.
